roleset.name: exist before
roleset.note: PREEXIST-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to 'predate.01'. (from preexist.01-v)
PREEXISTING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from preexisting.01-j)

example.name: Adjectival usage
example.text: 30 million Americans without access to affordable care , people with preexisting conditions thrown out

example.name: Both args
example.text: But stop talking about rights that-1 [*-1] preexist the Constitution.
